item.title: Mentioned by Xtra.ca
item.description:
Justice committee kills cyberbullying bill
Liberal MP Dr Hedy Fry is accusing NDP MP Dany Morin of politicking and reneging on his word for voting against her private member's bill targeting cyberbullying at a meeting of the standing committee on justice and human rights. Bill C-273 aims to add ...

item.description:

“I have asked my colleague Dany Morin (Chicoutimi-Le Fjord) to bring the concerns of local residents to the House of Commons,” said Mr. Mulcair. “To do politics differently means to fight cynicism. Only the NDP is in a position to replace the Conservative ...

item.title: Mentioned by Sun News Network
item.description:
NDP taking on Harper in new campaign
"We will be using this so the government will be haunted by past promises that have been broken and reminded of its systemic destruction of regional economies," says NDP MP Guy Caron. Caron then ran through a long list of services that have been cut by the Harper ... from the Saguenay area represented by recent defector MP Claude Patry. NDP leader Tom Mulcair will be joined by MPs Alexandre Boulerice, Nycole Turmel and Dany Morin to kick off the campaign in several regions of Quebec simultaneously.

item.title: Mentioned by Yahoo! News Canada (blog)
item.description:
NDP defection rehashes the party's 'Quebec sovereignty' problem
